## üíª Software Inventory Dashboard

### Complete Software Asset Management

Monitor all installed programs across your Windows and Linux estate:

**üìä Dashboard Features:**
- Real-time software inventory from Windows Registry and Linux package managers
- Filter by hostname and software name
- Complete host specifications (OS, IP, last reboot)
- Detailed software listings with versions and install dates

**üîç Supported Platforms:**
- **Windows**: Registry-based inventory (32-bit and 64-bit programs)
- **Linux**: APT-based (Ubuntu/Debian) and DNF-based (RHEL/CentOS/Fedora)

**üìù Use Cases:**
- Software license compliance
- Security patch verification
- Software standardization
- Vulnerability management

3.query:
fetch dt.entity.host

| fields 
    entity.name,
    osType,
    ipAddress = toIP(ipAddress),
    monitoringMode
| fields 
    hostname = entity.name,
    os_type = osType,
    ip_addresses = toString(ipAddress),
    monitoring = monitoringMode
| parse hostname, """LD:host.name "."
"""
| fieldsAdd hostname = if(isNotNull(host.name), then:host.name, else:hostname)
| fieldsRemove host.name
| filter matchesValue(hostname,$hostname)

## üìù Dashboard Usage

### Filters
- **Hostname**: Filter by specific server(s) - supports multiple selection
- **Software Name**: Filter by specific program(s) - supports multiple selection

### Key Metrics
- **Total Programs**: Sum of all installed programs across selected hosts
- **Hosts Monitored**: Number of unique hosts reporting data

### Tips
- Use the software name filter to track specific applications across your fleet
- Export tables to CSV for compliance reporting
- Compare program counts across hosts to identify inconsistencies
